about.companyDescription: Smartteam is a professional company engaged in the import of commercial equipment, computers, and electronic products. Throughout our operations, we have strengthened our position in the market by providing our customers with reliable, high-quality, and innovative products. By constantly keeping up with technological advancements, we aim to add value to our partners and customers.
about.missionStatement: We believe that technology should make life easier, safer, and more productive. That is why we deliver modern IT and security solutions designed to support both businesses and individuals. From small offices to large enterprises, our services are built to provide efficiency, safety, and long-term reliability.
about.whoWeAreDesc: A trusted partner in IT and security solutions, serving businesses and individuals.
about.whatWeDoDesc: We provide professional sales, installation, and support for computers, office equipment, and low-current systems.
about.ourMissionDesc: To deliver secure, innovative, and reliable technology that improves efficiency and safety.
about.securitySystemsDesc: We reliably protect your workplaces and living spaces with security systems developed...

secure.hemsoftDesc: The Hemsoft software, provided by Smartteam, is a modern POS and management system specially designed for your business. Take your business to the next level with Hemsoft.
secure.ourServicesDesc: Our services are designed to provide maximum safety and smooth operation. These systems, installed by our professional team, ensure the highest level of security for your property.
secure.fastInstallationDesc: We ensure the software is installed safely and without delays, so you can start using it right away.
secure.customizedSetupDesc: All configurations are tailored to match your specific business needs and requirements.
secure.staffTrainingDesc: Your team receives practical training and guidance to use the system effectively.
secure.continuousAssistanceDesc: Enjoy reliable technical support and regular updates to keep your system running at its best.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: Welcome to Gunay Beauty Store. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you visit our website (gunaybeauty.az) and use our services.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content:
We collect information that you provide directly to us. This includes: 
• Personal identifiers: Name, email address, and phone number.
• Account information: Encrypted password and authentication tokens.
• Order details: Products purchased, quantities, total amounts, and currency (AZN).
• Technical data: Although collected automatically by many hosting services, we primarily focus on data necessary for your session, such as authentication cookies.

howWeCollect.title: How We Collect Information
howWeCollect.content:
Information is gathered through several methods:
• Registration: When you create an account on our platform.
• Checkout & Quick Order: When you provide details to facilitate a purchase.
• Direct Interaction: When you contact us via our contact forms or customer service.
• Automated Technologies: We use cookies and local storage to manage your shopping cart and maintain your logged-in session.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Information
howWeUse.content:
Your data is used solely to provide and improve our services, including:
• Order Processing: To handle your purchases.
• Account Management: To maintain your profile, order history, and loyalty points.
• Communication: To contact you regarding your orders or response to inquiries.
• Security: To protect our website and your account from unauthorized access.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
We use essential cookies and storage technologies:
• Authentication Cookies: To keep you logged in to your account securely.
• Local Storage: We use 'ecommerce_cart' in your browser's local storage to save your shopping cart items across sessions.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content:
We integrate with third-party providers to enhance our services:
• Google Fonts: Used for professional website typography.

sharingSec.title: Data Sharing & Security
sharingSec.content: We do not sell or rent your personal data to third parties. We only share information when necessary to fulfill your orders or when required by law. We implement industry-standard security measures, including password encryption and JWT (JSON Web Tokens), to protect your data.

rightsRetention.title: User Rights & Retention
rightsRetention.content: You have the right to access, update, or request the deletion of your personal information through your profile page. We retain your data as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you with services and comply with legal obligations.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that a child has provided us with personal data, we will take steps to delete such information.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us through any of the following channels:

payment.successText: Thank you! Your order has been placed successfully and is being processed.
payment.errorMessage: There was an issue processing your payment. Please try again or contact support.
